Question: BeAware the Deaf Assistant CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
BeAware

Deaf Assistant CES 2024

- Fastest transcription app for the Deaf and hard of hearing
- Launching new line of free apps for the Deaf and hard-of-hearing community at CES 2024
- Includes BeAware Conference Captioning App and HealthScribe app
- Conference Captioning App provides real-time captioning for in-person events within 15 seconds
- HealthScribe offers offline live transcriptions and translations for Deaf and limited English proficiency patients
- Available in 50 countries and 30+ languages
- Aims to reduce inequalities and support accessibility
- Features customizable alerts for safety
- BeAware will be at CES 2024, Booth #60464 at the Venetian Expo, Eureka Park, Level 1, Hall G
Summary_cn:
注意

2024 年 CES 无障碍助手

- 适用于聋人和听力有障碍者的最快速录音应用程序
- 在 2024 年 CES 推出用于聋人和听力有障碍群体的新系列免费应用程序 
- 包括 BeAware 会议字幕应用程序和 HealthScribe 应用程序
- 会议字幕应用程序可在 15 秒内提供现场活动的实时字幕
- HealthScribe 为聋人和英语能力有限的患者提供离线实时转录和翻译
- 在 50 个国家和30多种语言可用
- 旨在减少不平等并支持无障碍
- 具备个性化安全提醒功能
- BeAware 将在 CES 2024 展台 #60464 上亮相，地点位于威尼斯人博览会的Eureka Park，1楼，G馆位
